result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence:
Defendant appears in custody and with Atty Andrew Morgan;
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to:
15CM2141:
Ct. 1 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 2 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia-Repeater)>>DRI.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.
  
PLEA: 
15CM1754:
Ct. 1 (Obstructing an Officer-Repeater)>> NO CONTEST.

15CM2142:
Ct. 1 (Obstructing an Officer-Repeater)>> NO CONTEST.
Ct. 2 (BJ-Repeater)>> NO CONTEST.
Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
15CM1754:
Ct. 1 (Obstructing an Officer-Repeater)>> Sentence W/H- 2 Years Probation, concurrent. CONDITIONS: AODA and follow up, Absolute Sobriety from Controlled Substances unless medications and only within prescribed amount, Counseling as recommended, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 15 Hours of Community Service per week, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample.

15CM2142:
Ct. 1 (Obstructing an Officer-Repeater)>> Sentence W/H- 2 Years Probation, concurrent. CONDITIONS: AODA and follow up, Absolute Sobriety from Controlled Substances unless medications and only within prescribed amount, Counseling as recommended, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 15 Hours of Community Service per week, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample.

Ct. 2 (BJ-Repeater)>> Sentence W/H- 2 Years Probation, concurrent. CONDITIONS: AODA and follow up, Absolute Sobriety from Controlled Substances unless medications and only within prescribed amount, Counseling as recommended, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 15 Hours of Community Service per week, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample.
